Package prkmodel.types.templates

Class DefaultNeuronNetwork

java.lang.Object
prkmodel.types.templates.DefaultNeuronNetwork
All Implemented Interfaces:
NeuronNetwork
Direct Known Subclasses:
RepastNeuronNetwork
public class DefaultNeuronNetwork extends Object implements NeuronNetwork
Default implementation of the NeuronNetwork interface. Represents the network of neurons in the nervous system with default behaviors and properties.

To implement a subclass:

  • Ensure the constructor properly initializes inherited fields.
  • Override methods to provide specific behavior.
  • Document the purpose of any new methods or overridden methods.
  • Use super to call the superclass method when overriding to extend or modify its behavior.

Since:
2024-07-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Samuele95
